text: Are their any tricks required to get the "marketProjection" attribute of the "filter" on "listMarketCatalogue" working. It's not making any difference on my response even if I set "maxResults" to 1. Any thoughts?

elements.text: Are their any tricks required to get the "marketProjection" attribute of the "filter" on "listMarketCatalogue" working. It's not making any difference on my response even if I set "maxResults" to 1. Any thoughts?

text: you able to share your code?

elements.text: you able to share your code?

text: Example: <https://github.com/liampauling/betfair/blob/master/examples/exampleone.py#L29>

attachments.title: liampauling/betfair
attachments.text: betfair - Lightweight python wrapper for Betfair API-NG (with streaming)

elements.text: Example:

text: I'm currently doing it in PostMan

elements.text: I'm currently doing it in PostMan

text: POST to <https://api.betfair.com/exchange/betting/rest/v1.0/listMarketCatalogue/>

elements.text: POST to

text:
{
    "filter": 
    {
    	"eventTypeIds"		: 	["7"],
    	"marketTypeCodes"	:	["WIN"],
    	"marketCountries"	:	["IE", "GB"],
    	"marketProjection": [
                "COMPETITION",
                "EVENT",
                "EVENT_TYPE",
                "MARKET_START_TIME",
                "MARKET_DESCRIPTION",
                "RUNNER_DESCRIPTION",
                "RUNNER_METADATA"
            ]
    },
    "maxResults" : 1000,
    "sort" : "FIRST_TO_START",
    "locale": "en"
}

elements.text:
{
    "filter": 
    {
        "eventTypeIds"        :     ["7"],
        "marketTypeCodes"    :    ["WIN"],
        "marketCountries"    :    ["IE", "GB"],
        "marketProjection": [
                "COMPETITION",
                "EVENT",
                "EVENT_TYPE",
                "MARKET_START_TIME",
                "MARKET_DESCRIPTION",
                "RUNNER_DESCRIPTION",
                "RUNNER_METADATA"
            ]
    },
    "maxResults" : 1000,
    "sort" : "FIRST_TO_START",
    "locale": "en"
}
